fr.gouv.finances.cp.utils

Class PropertiesExpansion

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • fr.gouv.finances.cp.utils.PropertiesExpansion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

    public class PropertiesExpansion
extends java.util.Properties
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The tag ${} is used to introduce substitutable parameters so it expands properties with ${} described in a property file; it is possible to have different sections with the same names as:
    global_name1=z1
    sec_name=v
    x1=2
    y1=0
    [section_1]
    x1=${x1}
    [section2]
    x1=zxc
    [${sec_name}]
    ...
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
